Posts.Content: Jun 6, 2013 08:13AM Nissi wrote: pegs54, cat24, It has been 20 months for me since my tram flap procedure (pedicled) and I know what you mean. still numb, cant stand anything touching my stomach or right under the middle of my breast area.  feels very strange!.  I still have to wear loose pants, no jeans! It gets more uncomfortable as the day goes on, I feel like there is less room for my stomache to expand after eating a meal. It is hard to describe to people who dont understand, it is  nice to know others feel the same way(unfortunately). Nissi
Posts.Title: Pedicle Tram Flap Recovery - Help! sandy2009 Nissi
